title: Bar Love Milano
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Italian, Macrobiotic, Organic, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery
description: A vegetarian restaurant with a light and quiet atmosphere and a white and lilac decor. Uses fresh organic fruits and veggies, centrifuged juices, smoothies and milkshakes, salads and yogurt, sandwiches and panini. Has a grab 'n go section with a vast selection of salads. Eco-friendly. Free Wi-Fi. Children area for parents and children.
